statements: UPDATE baseball_games SET winning_team='Yankees', winning_score=5 WHERE game_id=1;
UPDATE baseball_games SET losing_score=3, losing_team='Red Sox' WHERE game_id=2;
UPDATE baseball_games SET winning_score = 10, losing_score = 5, mvp_name = 'John Doe' WHERE game_id = 100
UPDATE baseball_games SET winning_team = 'Yankees', losing_team = 'Red Sox', key_plays = 'Bottom of the 9th inning, game-winning home run' WHERE game_date = '2022-08-15'
UPDATE baseball_games SET home_score = 6, away_score = 4 WHERE game_id = 101;
UPDATE game_details SET mvp = 'John Smith', key_play = 'Grand Slam' WHERE game_id = 103;
UPDATE baseball_games SET home_score = 10, away_score = 7 WHERE game_id = 101;
UPDATE game_details SET mvp = 'John Doe', key_play = 'Game-winning home run' WHERE game_id = 101;
UPDATE scores SET score = 100 WHERE game_id = 1;
UPDATE mvps SET player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE game_id = 2;
UPDATE scores SET score = 100 WHERE game_id = 1 AND team = 'Team A';
UPDATE mvps SET player_name = 'John Doe', team = 'Team B' WHERE game_id = 2;
UPDATE baseball_games SET home_score = 5, away_score = 3 WHERE game_id = 101;
UPDATE game_results SET mvp = 'Mike Trout', key_play = 'Home Run' WHERE game_id = 101;
UPDATE baseball_games SET home_score = 5, away_score = 3 WHERE game_id = 101;
UPDATE game_results SET key_play = 'Home run in the 9th inning', mvp = 'John Doe' WHERE game_id = 101;
UPDATE games SET winning_team = 'Team A' WHERE game_id = 1;
UPDATE players SET player_position = 'Forward' WHERE player_id = 3;
UPDATE games SET winning_team = 'Team A', losing_team = 'Team B' WHERE game_id = 1;
UPDATE plays SET play_result = 'Touchdown' WHERE game_id = 1 AND player_id = 3;
